name: Anime Quiz
description:
Do you like anime?

Can you guess the anime from the frame?

The rules of the quiz are simple:
- 1 frame from anime
- 4 answer options
- 3 lives

When the game shows a frame from the anime and several answer options, then you need to choose one correct option. If the wrong answer is chosen, then one life is burned. In total, you can make a mistake 3 times. After that, you will have to start the game over.

In the game you will find 500 anime of various genres and years of release. There is everyone's favorite classics and new popular titles. Also contains the latest news for 2020.

Happy passing Anime quiz!

Icon made by smalllikeart from www.flaticon.com
